title: Rune Pages Corrupted ???
body:
I cannot change my runes. Every time I click "save changes" it pops up with "Failed to save runebook due to corrupted runebook"

Help! Nothing I do helps, this is why I kept the old Legacy Client :-(

replies.body: This is an issue on our side caused by the rearrangement of rune pages while in the Beta Client. If you write in a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can get you fixed right away. This will involve resetting your rune pages! If you want to see an immediate fix, just let me know as soon as you get this that you're okay with the reset !
Hi I have the same problem, any chance for a reset?
Never mind fixed it myself... had to completly delete pages and save then remake pages. Hopefully my rune book will stay uncorrupted from now on.

So you have a "**feature**" (rearranging runepages) but shipped it knowing that using this "**feature**" would corrupt rune pages completely, making _more work_ for your support staff _and_ players by having to reset all the runepages from scratch....

#RiotLogic.
Yes please help however you can!
Alrighty, I've applied the fixes to your account! Be sure to make new rune pages **BEFORE** you get into a game and be sure to stay away from special characters and moving the rune pages!
Actually, its showing the same problem! I do believe you did something on your end, however my end is not wanting to cooperate
Woah, that's weird. Hit me up in a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and I'll look into this tomorrow when I get back in!
